resources.string: The app can not get user location
The location is needed for locate your device in the map,if you don\'t allow we cant track your position
This permission is used for put marker in map when someone call
Con este permiso podemos iniciar automáticamente su reproductor de música cuando llegue el sms
If you don´t accept this permission, we can\'t check your actual phone number and we can\'t stop the location request when call is in process
we can not automatically start the music player when the sms arrive, because the permission is denied
no Location provider active, do you want activate one?
